name: Hansen Recruiting
tag_list: ecommerce, sem, seo, search-marketing, mobile, online-media, digital-marketing, it, software, interactive
overview:
Whether you’re an ecommerce start-up just entering the market or a massive media giant seeking to expand your online marketing division, we have the resources to help. Every organization is fighting for the attention of top talent and we are seeking to be your recruiting partner for success! With our strong industry contacts and network of digital talent, Hansen Recruiting will provide your company with the competitive advantage all companies strive for, the most sought after talent in this industry.

We focus our recruiting efforts within the Interactive, Digital, Search Marketing, Social Media, Mobile, Ecommerce and Online Media industries. Because we work within a niche market, we know the precise competitors to target, and the most desirable industry leaders to contact.

Hansen Recruiting has earned an outstanding reputation and track record within the world of interactive recruiting. We have done this by creating valuable relationships with top industry players and the most sought after talent. This, combined with our cutting-edge experience in recruitment and technical knowledge, has catapulted us to successful placements of some of the hardest positions to fill in the industry.

Our goal is to build lasting, long-term relationships, with our clients and candidates rather than completing a one-time transaction.
